welcome_message:
Welcome to the default-app template for Databricks Asset Bundles!

⚠️  EXPERIMENTAL: This template is under active development and may change.

This template creates a full-stack TypeScript application powered by Databricks AppKit,
with a React frontend and Node.js backend.

Note that {{workspace_host}} is used for initialization.
(For information on how to change your profile, see https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/cli/profiles.html.)

project_name.description:
Unique name for this project.
project_name
project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.

http_path.pattern_match_failure_message: Path must be of the form /sql/1.0/warehouses/<warehouse id>
http_path.description:
Please provide the HTTP Path of the SQL warehouse you would like to use during development.
You can find this path by clicking on "Connection details" for your SQL warehouse.
http_path [example: /sql/1.0/warehouses/abcdef1234567890]

sql_warehouse_id.//: Hidden property derived from http_path; extracts the warehouse ID

app_description.default: A Databricks App powered by Databricks AppKit

profile.//: Hidden property for advanced use; allows overriding auth via CLI profile instead of workspace host

success_message:
✨ Your new project has been created in the '{{.project_name}}' directory!

Next steps:
  cd {{.project_name}}
  npm install
  npm run dev

To deploy:
  databricks bundle deploy --target dev
